heisigComment: * As a primitive, we shall give this kanji the meaning of yarn, as the uniting of many threads into a single strand is most obvious with yarn.
heisigStory: The single stroke added to the beginning of the primitive for thread gives the image of threads woven into a single cord. Hence the meaning, lineage.
koohiiStory1: A single drop of your blood holds the proof of the unbroken thread of your lineage.
koohiiStory2: Spiderman´s lineage (who his family is etc...) can be found in his DNA in a drop of blood. The villain that gets blood of Spidey will be able to find out who is family and lineage is. be carfefull spidey...
words:
系(けい): system, lineage, group
系統(けいとう): system, family line, lineage, ancestry, geological formation
体系(たいけい): system, organization
